title: Money in the Streets
text:
Money in the Streets (German: Das Geld auf der Strasse) is a 1922 Austrian-German <a href="silent%20film">silent</a> <a href="drama%20film">drama film</a> directed by <a href="Reinhold%20Sch%C3%BCnzel">Reinhold Schünzel</a> and starring <a href="Liane%20Haid">Liane Haid</a>, <a href="Liesl%20Stillmark">Liesl Stillmark</a> and <a href="Max%20Ralph-Ostermann">Max Ralph-Ostermann</a>.
The film's sets were designed by the <a href="art%20director">art director</a> <a href="Oscar%20Friedrich%20Werndorff">Oscar Friedrich Werndorff</a>. It was shot at the <a href="Sch%C3%B6nbrunn%20Studios">Schönbrunn Studios</a> in <a href="Vienna">Vienna</a>.
